subject: Re: [junit] Help needed
msgSnippet: ... There is a TestListener interface in JUnit and it should be easy to find in the source JAR file (src.jar). -- J. B. Rainsberger, Diaspar Software Services
messageBody:
santu nand wrote:

> I need an urgent help.I want to know whether the Junit Framework has
> testListener interface.Please let me where i will get the
> 'testlistener.java' if it is there.I tryed with 2.1 and 3.8.1 and
> couldn't get it.

There is a TestListener interface in JUnit and it should be easy to find
in the source JAR file (src.jar).
--
J. B. Rainsberger,
Diaspar Software Services
http://www.diasparsoftware.com :: +1 416 791-8603
Let's write software that people understand
